 void removeDebugFrame()
           
 void showDebugFrame()
           
 void stable(int leader)
          When becoming stable there are four cases: - was leader (active) and still leader: do nothing - was not leader (inactive) and still not leader: do nothing - was leader (active) and now not leader: deativate - was not leader (inactive) and now leader: activate
 void start()
          Starts the global register server
 void terminate()
          Stop the threads associated with the global register (the request server thread) and deactivate the global.
 java.lang.String toString()
          List out the contents of the register by node.
 void unstable(int leader)
          When becoming unstable there are four cases: - was leader (active) and still leader: reset (deactivate+activate) - was leader (active) and not now leader: deactivate - was not leader (inactive) and now leader: activate - was not leader (inactive) and still not leader: do nothing

Method Detail

start

public void start()
Starts the global register server

terminate

public void terminate()
Stop the threads associated with the global register (the request server thread) and deactivate the global.

activate

public void activate()
Set this global register to be active. When active the register will process incoming requests.

deactivate

public void deactivate()
deactivate: simply drop all info. The new global will rebuild from the local registers. Any new requests will be dropped when not active.

checkNodes

public void checkNodes(View view)
Removes registrations for listeners and providers that are located at a node absent from the view provided.

Parameters:
view -

stable

public void stable(int leader)
When becoming stable there are four cases: - was leader (active) and still leader: do nothing - was not leader (inactive) and still not leader: do nothing - was leader (active) and now not leader: deativate - was not leader (inactive) and now leader: activate

Parameters:
leader -

unstable

public void unstable(int leader)
When becoming unstable there are four cases: - was leader (active) and still leader: reset (deactivate+activate) - was leader (active) and not now leader: deactivate - was not leader (inactive) and now leader: activate - was not leader (inactive) and still not leader: do nothing

Parameters:
leader -

deliverRequest

public void deliverRequest(RegisterMsg request)
If this global register is active queue the request in the request queue. If it is not active just return.

Parameters:
request -

deliver

public void deliver(RegisterMsg request)
call the appropirate method to execute the request. This method is called by the request server after pulling a request off of the requests queue.

Parameters:
request -

List out the contents of the register by node.
